mapper.select: SELECT midx, id, nick_name, membername, birthday, gender, phone, join_date, mileage, grade, del_yn, blacklist_yn, follower_cnt, post_code, addr, profile_system FROM member WHERE midx = #{midx}
SELECT midx FROM member WHERE midx = #{midx} AND pass = SHA2(#{pass},512)
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET pass = SHA2(#{pass},512) WHERE midx = #{midx}

UPDATE member SET id = #{id}, nick_name = #{nick_name}, gender = #{gender}, phone = CONCAT(#{phone1},"-",#{phone2},"-",#{phone3}), addr = CONCAT(#{addr1}," ",#{addr2})
WHERE midx = #{midx}
mapper.select: SELECT olidx, title, price, cnt, delivery_charge, img_system, buying_date, progress, delivery_status, review_registration, spidx FROM order_list WHERE midx = #{midx} ORDER BY buying_date DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM order_list WHERE progress = #{progress} AND midx = #{midx}
